greyc.name: GREYC
greyc.desc: GREYC is a laboratory (UMR6072) under the CNRS, UNICAEN, ENSICAEN tutelage. I started my PhD thesis in the GREYC laboratory in 2016 into the E-Payement & Biometrics team which subjects are trust and biometrics.

reg.name: Mediterranea University of Reggio Calabria
reg.desc: During my PhD, I spent 1,5 months at the Mediterranea University of Reggio Calabria in the scope of a research collaboration.

uio.name: University of Oslo
uio.desc: University of Oslo (UiO) is the oldest Norwegian University, and the largest until 2016. In 2015, and then in 2016, I made two internship (3-months, and 5-months), inside the Department of Informatics (IfI), working on the OffPAD, an Eurostar project (E!8324), resulting in two publications.

crosenberger.name: Christophe Rosenberger
crosenberger.desc: My Thesis director, and director of the GREYC laboratory. His research focus on Biometrics, Fingerprint quality, Keystroke dynamics, Cancelable biometrics, Soft biometrics, template update, forensic analysis, and transparent authentication.

fbuccafurri.name: Francesco Buccafurri
fbuccafurri.desc: Director of the Computer Science laboratory at the Mediterranea University of Reggio Calabria.

ajosang.name: Audun JÃ¸sang
ajosang.desc: Professor at the University of Oslo. His research focus on Identity management, Trust and reputation management, Network security, Security usability, Subjective logic.

cjohansen.name: Christian Johansen
cjohansen.desc: Researcher at the University of Oslo. His research focus on Modelling of security protocols, programming language formal semantics, modelling language, verification of networked systems, and more.
